mapper.update: update l_riji set title=#{title},feel_score=#{feelScore},content=#{content},pic=#{pic},url=#{url} where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from l_riji where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select lr.id as id,lu.user_name as userName,title,feel_score,content,lr.pic as pic,create_time,url from l_riji lr left join l_user lu on lu.id = lr.user_id
